scripts.create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name smt --region eu-west-1 --template-body file://smt.json
scripts.update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name smt --region eu-west-1 --template-body file://smt.json
scripts.validate: aws cloudformation create-change-set --stack-name smt --region eu-west-1 --template-body file://smt.json --change-set-name test
